content.prompt: Religious change in the seventeenth-century Netherlands led to

choices.label: a great vitality in intellectual and artistic life
an emphasis on decorative rather than fine arts
a rebirth of fresco painting in the churches
the exclusion of women artists from portrait painting
the establishment of official censorship to purge Catholic influences from the arts

topic.text: 2.8: Causation in the Age of Reformation and the Wars of Religion

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
